title: Many Blue Essence questions answered here! Having issues Patching 7.22? Click Here!

replies.body: Hello! I completed my missions to receive  the BE , opened the capsules , got like 15k , couldn't buy anything from the shop with the BE , relogged and it was all gone. I only have the first win of the day mission , don't have capsules anymore , it just feels weird. The BE simply disappeared.

Hey yeah, I checked into this for you and something seems off.  Your Refund should have yielded 102500 BE, but you have about 2k~ and I'm not seeing any purchases.  Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so we can investigate and help you out directly.  Thanks for letting us know!
I've got 450 be from chest for lvl up (nasus shard + 240 be ore something). Isn't lowest be from chest supposed to be 720 be?

I think I received an incorrect amount of BE.
According to the FAQ, the epic skins received for bought Rune Pages is rounded up, so If you bought 4, you get 1 Skin, 5 pages is 2 skins.
Now, I don't remember what I bought and with what, but I received 2 Epic Skins, and my pages showed 19 in the client. 

So 2 Epic skins, that means that I have bought from 5 to 8 Rune Pages with RP. Lets say it's 8. That leaves 11 pages bought with IP.
11x 1,500 = 16,500 BE. Right? Still with me?

I only received 13,000 BE. Which means I didn't even receive the full amount for the pages, and 0 BE for my runes. I did receive Icon and the Skin Ward for Legacy Runes.

Of your rune pages, 8 were purchased with RP that prized the 2 skins.  Your BE jumped up to 77748 BE after the conversion, and had 23851 IP before the preseason.  Most of the BE needed to be collected by completing the mission and collecting the capsules, which seems that this account has done.  I'm not seeing anything out of the ordinary but if you'd like more context have concerns, do reach out to us directly in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so we can assist you individually!

I just completed the Rune Enthusiast BE mission, but the no BE was added to my balance. I also got a dialogue box that showed my balance as the client shows pus another amount, and the sum in the middle (cant remember the exact numbers) but only the "before" amount is shown as my balance. should i submit a ticket, or did the client just show me phantom numbers?

The "Ok Cool" notification you get shows the total BE you will receive, including capsules after completing the mission.  Your BE is still sitting in your inventory, you'll need to go to hextech crafting and unlock them onto your account.

This specific account only has the First Win of The Day mission.  While you did have some IP converted to your current balance (previous IP+ previous BE x 6.5), there was no conversion for capsule missions because there were no eligible previous runes or pages.  Sorry for the confusion!

Yet again I've just got 450 be and that's all. Wtf is this bullshit?

I think a lot of the BE problems would be improved if you only got champ shards of champs you don't have from capsules, increasing the chance of actually using the 20% discount the shard gives you. If you have all the champs you get flat BE

Hi, i was wondering if you could help. after updating client i've received nothing about a blue ess mission to complete and had absolutely no rewards from prior season.. secondly I have logged in multiple times to say congratulations you have a honor capsule etc.. i hit OK then go to loot and there is no capsule there.. please help riot.. i feel like i'm missing out on heaps of stuff

Hey I looked into this for you, but the account did not purchase any greater runes or pages with IP before September 1.  There was no mission for capsules as a result, because there was nothing to convert.  Honor capsules are different, and should appear in your hextech crafting inventory.  Your last honor capsule was on the first, so you might be looking at older notifications that weren't dismissed yet.
